text: I m so disappointed by myself I don t want to live anymoreFor many years I have been contemplating the meaning of life  I have always been the kind of undecisive person never taking a real path and always changing my mind about things  I changed my major at university so many times and never actually graduate  So I took a job and got married at   Then moved to Thailand  my wife s country and found a job where I worked for   years and we had   kids  Unfortunately my confused personality reemerged again after my  st birthday and I started sort of mid life crisis that pushed me to leave my job  I felt unhappy and wanted more but without any qualifications I was already lucky to have that job  I had panic attacks when I gave my resignation letter to the boss so that he realized I wasn t really   sane so now he doesn t want me back   After that I stopped sleeping  had furious panic attacks with me screaming in front of my kids and wife  Eventually I went back home and got in a psychiatric ward for a month where they gave my heavy sedatives and anti depressants  I attempted sucide with pills once  After a few months I felt better and went back to Thailand and for   year I have been able even to work for a new place and earn money Problem is now I feel deeply unhappy and insecure about my life  underappreciated by everyone  My wife simply doesn t understand me and tries to find obstacles instead of helping me  I feel depression coming back and I wish to end my life  Only my kids keep me here  I want to help them to survive this heelish world but with this conflict inside of me I don t know how to find peace

text: Began cutting myself a few days ago and feel really accomplished whenever I do itSorry if this is the wrong sub since I m currently not having any suicidal thoughts  but here it goes  I ve had suicidal attempts in the past   both from hanging  and I ve been going to a therapist for about a month now  I don t know if it s helping  but I just know that the anti depressants are making me feel emotionless at times  I m still experiencing depression constantly and the thought of suicide is always on my mind  For the past few weeks  I ve just been imagining my suicide attempt finally working  but I m not actually planning on doing anything  Meaning  if I can kill myself right here  right now  without thinking of consequences afterwards  I would do it   The past few days  I started cutting myself on my wrist  I use a small box cutter and slit my wrist just enough to see a red scar  I don t know if I m crazy  but I feel a sense of accomplishment and rush whenever I do it  I have made   distinct cuts so far  but have concealed them with my watch band  I feel tempted to cut myself all the time now  I just feel like I need it  I wish I can keep cutting and not care if other people will see   Just wanted to get this off my chest  At least the cutting is postponing the suicidal thoughts for now TL DR Started cutting myself and feel good about it  Suicidal thoughts are gone whenever I do it

text: I really don t want my impulsivity to kill meSo  Im in a new country for the next   months  with a different langue that I only sorta know  which has impacted my ability to make connections  I currently can t text  so I can t reach out the suicide help lines in the US   I have a really hard time not over analyzing people s reactions to what I say or do  so Im always arguing with myself about whether people like me  and how much I care if they do  In general Id say my self esteem is shit  Before I started my medication  I had a bit of a temper  I felt so justified at the time  but now I have lingering guilt and shame about it  I pushed away a lot of people  wasn t always understanding  Even without the anger  I still feel like the odd one out  I have Bipolar Disorder  ADHD  GAD social anxiety and some lingering cPTSD PTSD  Im taking meds for the bipolar disorder  but it s not perfect  I can be pretty impulsive  but before today  I ve never considered myself a danger to myself   When I think about it  I always come to the conclusion that I want to live  and that I have a lot to live for  I have a lovely SO  my sister who s my bestfriend  and some cats that I m looking forward to coming home to  I want to come home  and I want to do well here  Unfortunately these motivating thoughts don t always precede stupid impulses   I need some sort of mantra  or new thought pattern to keep me afloat and alive  Something that can precede or intercede an unsafe impulse  Any and all advice is appreciated
summary: I have Bipolar Disorder ADHD GAD social anxiety and PTSD. I am in a new country for the next months. I have a lot to live for. I want to come home and do well here. I need some sort of mantra to keep me afloat.
